title: How to Make Fake Poo in a Diaper with Chocolate

steps.title: Place 5 to 6 different candy bars into 5 to 6 microwave-safe bowls.
steps.content: Place 5 to 6 different candy bars into 5 to 6 microwave-safe bowls.

steps.title: Melt the candy bars in the microwave until they have liquefied.
steps.content: Melt the candy bars in the microwave until they have liquefied.

steps.title: Spoon a candy bar into a diaper until you’ve filled all 6 diapers.
steps.content: Spoon a candy bar into a diaper until you’ve filled all 6 diapers.

steps.title: Set the diapers on a table and number each diaper with a permanent marker.
steps.content: Set the diapers on a table and number each diaper with a permanent marker.

steps.title: Write down the correct candy bar associated with each number on a separate piece of paper.
steps.content: Write down the correct candy bar associated with each number on a separate piece of paper.

steps.title: Provide a piece of paper and a pencil to each guest..
steps.content: Provide a piece of paper and a pencil to each guest..

steps.title: Allow the guests to examine and sniff the diapers.
steps.content: Allow the guests to examine and sniff the diapers.

steps.title: Instruct your guests to write down the names of the candy bars they think are in each diaper.
steps.content: Instruct your guests to write down the names of the candy bars they think are in each diaper. Make sure they also write their names on their papers.

steps.title: Place a basket at the end of the diaper table to collect the guests’ entries.
steps.content: Place a basket at the end of the diaper table to collect the guests’ entries.

steps.title: Check the entries.
steps.content: Check the entries. The guest who matches the most “poo” to the correct candy bars wins the game. If you have multiple correct entries, then draw for a winner.

steps.title: Give the winner a party favor bag filled with an assortment of the chocolate candy bars that you used in the game.
steps.content: Give the winner a party favor bag filled with an assortment of the chocolate candy bars that you used in the game.
